sentences.pinyin: wǒ měitiān dōu huì yuèdú xīnwén.
sentences.translation: I read the news every day.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了提高我的中文水平，我每天都花至少一个小时阅读中文书籍。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了提高我的中文水平，我每天都花至少一個小時閲讀中文書籍。
sentences.pinyin: wèile tígāo wǒ de zhōngwén shuǐpíng, wǒ měitiān dōu huā zhìshǎo yīgè xiǎoshí yuèdú zhōngwén shūjí.
sentences.translation: In order to improve my Chinese level, I spend at least one hour reading Chinese books every day.
